name: Dancing Note
description:
Jump between the piano tiles along with the rhythm, dodge the obstacles and do not fall
How far can you reach?

Dancing Note, the most fun and addictive music game
Perfect combo of gameplay and the rhythm of piano tunes
Drag the ball, listen to the beat, and enjoy this amazing music journey!

Game Features:
— Simple and fun operation
— Fast paced, challenging your hand eye coordination
— 3D music scenes, anyone can be a pianist
— Over 50 high quality piano tunes
— Global ranking list, can you get to the top
